lead_paragraph: The S.&P. 500 closed lower, ending its longest rally in four months. The Dow ticked up slightly to set another record.

headline.main: Market Is Little Changed After Five-Day Rally

snippet: The S.&P. 500 closed lower, ending its longest rally in four months. The Dow ticked up slightly to set another record....
abstract: Stocks end five-day winning streak, following lackluster bank earnings.
